H0.text: River can make a shadow on the ground during the day.

H1.text: Air can make a shadow on the ground during the day.

H2.text: Thunder is something that can make a shadow on the ground during the day.

H3.text: Cloud can make a shadow on the ground during the day.

A4.text: Crepuscular rays often occur when objects such as mountain peaks or clouds partially shadow the Sun's rays like a cloud cover.
